0.2.0 - 2012-10-04
==================

- Add get_policy() method, which can be used to look up the loaded
  sub-policies at runtime.


0.1.2 - 2012-01-30
==================

- Update license to MPL 2.0.


0.1.1 - 2011-12-20
==================

- Compatability with Pyramid 1.3.


0.1.0 - 2011-11-11
==================

- Initial release.
